message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $9000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $7500?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we say $8500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $7500. Would you be willing to go down to $7000?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $8200?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $7500. Would you be willing to go down to $7200?
